misc.title: And I just wanted to point it out to others who don’t know him… As you can see me and that guy are mutuals… Why would I hate on this? Genuinely…

misc.title: People seem to interpret that I hate this… y’all complain about others who hate on Boruto that they have a poor reading comprehension but apparently you all have the same issue…? I never said that I h
misc.text: People seem to interpret that I hate this… y’all complain about others who hate on Boruto that they have a poor reading comprehension but apparently you all have the same issue…? I never said that I hate on this… I just think it’s funny that people suddenly start tweeting in Japanese? Whats wrong with this?
